LanguageData.CreateCrystalineSpike.label: Create crystaline spike
LanguageData.CreateCrystalineSpike.description: A large crystaline spike that replaces a forarm and hand. Manipulation is greatly decreased in exchange for a large boost to melee damage and speed
LanguageData.CreatePowerBionicArm.label: Create Power Bionic Arm
LanguageData.CreatePowerBionicArm.description: A mechanical arm that improves manipulation, melee damage and melee speed
LanguageData.CreatePowerEye.label: Create power bionic eye
LanguageData.CreatePowerEye.description: A mechanical eye that improves sight
LanguageData.CreatePowerHeart.label: Create power heart
LanguageData.CreatePowerHeart.description: A mechanical heart that imporves blood pumping
LanguageData.CreatePowerJaw.label: Create power bionic jaw
LanguageData.CreatePowerJaw.description: A mechanical jaw that provides increased eating speed and speech
LanguageData.CreatePowerKidney.label: Create power kidney
LanguageData.CreatePowerKidney.description: A mechanical kidney that improves blood filtration
LanguageData.CreatePowerLeg.label: Create power bionic leg
LanguageData.CreatePowerLeg.description: A mechanical leg that improves walking speed
LanguageData.CreatePowerLiver.label: Create power liver
LanguageData.CreatePowerLiver.description: A mechanical liver that improves blood filtration
LanguageData.CreatePowerLung.label: Create power lung
LanguageData.CreatePowerLung.description: A mechanical lung that imporves breathing
LanguageData.CreatePowerSpine.label: Create power bionic spine
LanguageData.CreatePowerSpine.description: A mechanical spine that improves speed and manipulation
